entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@marcorubio So they're in for what liver, kidney failure?
Heart problems (brought on by the virus)?
I'm just a painter but I know that Corona/covid19 causes a history of issues and that politicians try to mince words to minimize the situation. It's #BullShit 
#gop #dnc #TrumpIsAFelon
